revised_title: Magma Generation and Komatiites: Understanding High-Magnesia Lavas
tldr: This article discusses the recognition, characteristics, and potential origins of high-magnesia lavas, particularly komatiites, and their relationship to continental break-up and Archaean vulcanism. The author presents a new model for magma generation involving the mobilization of source material after a low degree of partial melting, which helps explain the composition of these unique lavas.
